sources.title: Hollywood Without Make-Up (1963)  Documentary
sources.description:
Starring Hollywood's Greatest Celebrities - A Peak at their Personal Lives!  Ken Murray shares three decades of personal home movies of dozens of Hollywood stars. Not only does he share his own, but home movies from several celebrity friends, as well.
 
Directors: Rudy Behlmer, Loring d'Usseau 
Writer: Royal Foster
Stars: Ken Murray, Eddie Albert, June Allyson
Genres: Documentary
